item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Sullivan's on Chapel

Sullivan's is a great casual bar located on Chapel Street. And if it's actually not raining one of these days, they do have a few nice tables out on the sidewalk too.

Specials are:
$2.50 - Coors Lite
$4 - Pints, all drafts
$4.50 - Guiness Pints
$5 - Wine

Contact is Ed (203) 583-9668

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour at Sullivans!
